attributes.action: UKIP to be involved in 2015 Televised Debates
attributes.additional_details:
UKIP to be involved in 2015 Televised Debates
 UKIP We believe that if The UK Independence Party or 'UKIP' beat either of the
coalition parties (Liberal Democrats) or (Conservative Party) at the European
Elections 2014, then the UKIP leader  Nigel Farage
should be allowed to participate and speak as
part of any televised leader debate ahead of the general election.
